name: Hip Hop Dance School Story Sim
name_original: Hip Hop Dance School Story Sim
description:
Amazing dance competition is started along with hip hop dance clashes. Be the part of this dance battle and start your dance school-stories by winning the entire just dance competition. Show your hip hop dance free expertise and wins that girls dance school competition. Amazing just dance characters with animation that will blow your mind. Be the hip hop superstar to compete your opponent by winning the dance challenge. Multiple dance modes; where dance battle begins in dance school stories. Just dance and wins that ballet show by doing some stunning hip hop of dance steps.


** Key Features **
• Easy to play
• Amazing dance arena with best graphics and amazing dance animations
• Multiple game-play modes with Best Street dance fun
• Select or customize your just dance characters
• Stunning school dance competition with best dance stories
